common.DO_YOU_REALLY_WANT_TO_DELETE_THIS_ITEM: Do you really want to delete this item?

landing.HEAD: Find your Fireteam
landing.STARTINGINFO: Destiny 2 TeamFinder is an app where players can find other guardians to play with. Easily set up a post of whatever activity you want to do and watch as people join. You can also check out your own loadout and others.
infoCardsDesc: Set up your own forum post of whatever raid, strike og other activity you want to complete. You can also search for already created posts and join waiting guardians.

Check out your own loadout right here on the app. You will also be able to check out the loadouts of players joining your post on the forum. This is very neat, considering you might require sertain weapons to be eqipped.
Simply invite the guardians joining your post by a /invite command ingame. This is easily done by us copying the invite link and ID number for you
infoCards2Desc: Vue is an open-source JavaScript framework used for making user interfaces and simple apps. It combines HTML, JS and CSS into one file, and makes it really easy to re-use code.
Node.js is an open-source JavaScript runtime enviroment that executes JavaScript code outside of a webbrowser.
MongoDB is a document oriented NoSQL database program. MongoDB uses JSON-like documents for data storage and is eary to query

about.HEAD: About
about.WELCOME: Welcome to the unofficial Destiny 2 teamfinder!
infowhy: We believe that the lack of a good system ingame to find a team for various activites was damaging for the community, therefor we decided to make this tailor-made teamfinder application for Destiny 2.
infohow: We want to make the community connection tighter and create new relations by bringing the community together i one place. When a team is created on the site the leader of the team can select the spesifications of the team and what is needed to run with the team. We hope that this will inspire and grow the community.
whatisit: Destiny 2 teamfinder is the unofficial teamfinder function for Destiny 2. This teamfinder function is available for everyone and anyone can make a new team! As a part of the Destiny 2 teamfinder community you'll be able to take your gameplay to a whole 'nother level.
inqury: If you have any questions, comments or feedback feel free to contact us at example@d2teamfinder.com.

forgotPassword.TITLE: Forgot my password
forgotPassword.DESCRIPTION: Enter your E-mail address so we can send you a message with instructions to recover your password
forgotPassword.RESET_EMAIL_SENT: We have sent a message to %{0} with instructions to recover your password
